entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Tasiujaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:58 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -30.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tasiujaq Airport 03:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Temperature: -30.6°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Humidity: 60 %
Wind Chill: -45
Dewpoint: -35.8°C
Wind: W 25 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 49 this evening and minus 55 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 33.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 33. Wind chill minus 55 in the morning and minus 50 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 38. Wind chill near minus 53. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
